CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, National Edition, August 20, 1949, pg. 5, reads: "Visitor - Evelyn Adams, Washington (D.C.) high school student, was a recent Pittsburgh visitor, guest of Mr. and Mrs. Govner Thorpe. While in Steel City the young lady got a glimpse of Carnegie Tech where she hopes to study art.  She is the daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Aubrey Adams. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Evelyn Adams wearing patchwork patterned skirt, posed with hand on back of chair in domestic interior
